column2: This character can naturally use both hands with equal skill. As a result, they are more efficient in whatever they do, whether it is swinging swords or writing letters.

This erratic character was born with a scatterbrained temperament. They tend to forget things easily, get distracted too easily, or both. This behavior may be endearing to some, but to others it is an annoyance.

column2: The Scatterbrain is unable to pay attention to one thing for more than a few moments.
The Jack of All Trades as the saying goes, is master of none.
The Polymath is well versed in all fields of study, yet often overshadow by those with more specialised education.
The Sage is a trove full of knowledge that few can match, efficiently able to fill any council position.
This character is a skilled alchemist pursuing the many mysteries of his trade.
This character views humans as the superior race.
This character views all races as equal.
This character is learning to become a full-fledged sorcerer.
This character is a skilled Sorcerer educated in the use of magic.
This character is learning to become a full-fledged druid.
This character is a scholar of the forest with deep understanding of nature's workings.
This character is a Witch, skilled healer with a natural talent for magic.
This character is a monster-slayer for hire undergone extensive training and mysterious rituals.
This character is a leader of a group of elven and dwarven rebels fighting against the discrimination of nonhumans.

Elves are one of the Elder Races (along with gnomes and dwarves). Elves, also known as Aen Seidhe, came to the Continent on their white ships much earlier than humans, but later than gnomes and dwarves.
Dwarves are one of the humanoid races. Together with gnomes and elves they are called the Old races, and along with gnomes they were one of the oldest sentient races on the Continent.

Halflings are one of the non-human races. They are between two and four feet tall and their feet are covered with curly hair (they do not usually wear any shoes). They are exceptionally agile and good at fighting with thrown weapons.

Humans are the major race in both the Northern Kingdoms and the Nilfgaardian Empire. When they first arrived on the already populated continent, they rather quickly set about conquering the lands already inhabited by elder races.
This character is kind and full of empathy. The sixth virtue, 'Humanitas', is popular with vassals, but makes for a rather poor Spymaster.
column3: La gentille, 'humanitas' en latin, est la sixième vertu. Ce personnage est très apprécié des vassaux et fait un piètre Maître-Espion.
column4: Dieser Charakter ist gütig und voller Einfühlungsvermögen. Die sechste Tugend, 'Humanitas', ist bei Vasallen sehr beliebt. Für Agentenführer ist sie dagegen eher abträglich.
column6: Este personaje es amable y derrocha empatía. La sexta virtud, 'humanitas', es popular entre los vasallos, pero es poco útil para jefes de espías.
